name: Motherhood impasto painting "Just close to you" original acrylic by Gioia Albano
description:
Motherhood impasto painting "Just close to you" original acrylic by Gioia Albano
Original acrylic impasto painting 
Original title in french "Tout près de toi"

Painted in Mimet (France) in september 2012

ANNOUNCEMENT this painting is on sale but it will be available for shipping AFTER the 23rd of september because it's in exhibition at the "7th ARTS Salon of Mimet" (France) until then

Wide cm 40
High cm 50

15,7 " x 19,6" 

price : 150 Euro 

For once I was inspired by my own photo with my youngest daughter Randi ;-) breastfeeding on the beach after taking a swim in lovely Corsica summer 2012

This is an acrilyc impasto painting which means that the paint is quite tick and comes out from the canvans and you can definitly see the paintbursh effect on it. It gives a relief at the painting and you'll love this special pergamene effect !

Wrapped Canvas: This canvas is wrapped around a 1 5/8" box stretcher bar and attached using galvanized staples. The edges are painted and a frame is not required.

Ready to hang, signed and dated on the back 
COA is provided

Tracking number is also provided when delivered

name: Little Colorfull Impasto Painting "She thinks" original acrylic by Gioia Albano
description:
Little Colorfull Impasto Painting "She thinks" original acrylic by Gioia Albano

Notice: © 2012 All rights reserved Art by Gioia Albano

I just love this woman figure! Dedicated to all women in the world that can still doubt and questioning themself! 

This original art may not be copied, printed, or used for any purpose without my written permission.

Size:
high cm 30 (11.8")
large cm 24 (9.4")

Price : 70 euro

Medium: full colors acrylic paint , final gloss varnish on canvas.
The sides of the canvases are painted . 

Date: 08/2012 in Puy St Vincent (France)

~Additional Info: 
-signature,-title,date and COA on the back
-ready to hang right out the package.

You will receive your painting in excellent brand new condition .Shipping insurance will be included for free,as well as tracking number.

name: Feminine oil painting "Woman of money" oil painting original by Gioia Albano
description:
Oil painting
Original

Original title (in italian) "Donna di denari"

Wide cm 50
High cm 61

19,6" x 24"

Painted in Copenhagen (Danemark) in july 2008

price : 280 Euro 

This painting is part of a series of 4, inspired on special italian play cards from Naple. We've got 4 signes : sword (spade), cups (coppe), money (denari), sticks (bastoni)

This is the woman of money. 

Ready to hang, not need a frame,signed and dated on the back

name: Story tale oil painting "The little mermaid" by Gioia Albano
description:
Wide cm 40 
High 60

15,7" x 23,6"

Painted in Aix en Provence (France) in may 2010 

This is the first of a series of paintings inspired on tales and also a little souvenir of the "lille havfrue" in Copenhagen (Denmark) where I spent 4 years of my life

The support is not a classic canvans but a kind of carton canvans usually used for paintings and about 2/3 mm deep 

Ready to hang, not need a frame, signed and dated on the back
